power.title: Burning Weapons
power.fluff: Flames dance across the weapons that you and comrades wield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you and any ally within 2 squares of you deals extra fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier with Weapon or Fire attacks.
You add the bonus from the effect to this damage roll.

power.title: Drain Speed
power.fluff: You bind the quickness of your enemy to the enchantments you placed on your ally, transferring speed from one to the other

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy, and one ally within 5 squares of the enemy

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target ally gains 5 temporary hit points.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target enemy is slowed. As long as the enemy is slowed, the target ally gains a +2 bonus speed.

power.title: Halo of Thorns
power.fluff: You enchant your ammunition with poisoning magic, then transfer that enchantment on one of your allies close to the target

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one ally within 5 squares of the target. Until the end of your next turn, any creature that hits that ally with a melee attack takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
